content: Has this event been confirmed for April 18-20 in Brisbane, directly after the NCTS Connectathon on April 17? @Brett Esler @Brian Postlethwaite
I think that the rooms have been booked.
Yes booked for Brisbane - Hotel Jen - 18th-19th April 0900-1700; 20th April 0900-1200 - a program and registration page is not too far away; will put a link here
Cool, I've booked my flights and accommodation. Will be there from 17-19, but have to leave that evening so will miss the Friday morning session.

HL7 Australia April Event: https://hl7au2018apr.eventbrite.com.au/ see details at http://site.hl7.org.au/events/hl7-au-connectathon-and-welcome-to-australian-argonaut-brisbane-april-2018/ don't miss the early bird discount
